Sun-cloak | weapons= | steed= }} '''Lurka''' is an [[Orcs of Mordor|Orc of the Southlands]] who oversaw the captives in the [[Orc-holds|trenches]]. Lurka was invented by [[Amazon Studios]] for ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]'', where he is portrayed by [[Robert Strange]].{{webcite|author=|articleurl=https://www.imdb.com/title/tt11609034/characters/nm6003807?ref_=ttfc_fc_cl_t28|articlename=Robert Strange: Lurka|dated=|website=IMDb|accessed=}}{{webcite|author=|articleurl=https://m.imdb.com/title/tt11609034/goofs/?tab=gf&ref_=tt_trv_gf|articlename=Adar (TV Episode) - Spoilers and Bloopers - IMDb |dated=|website=IMDb|accessed=}} {{References}} [[Category:Orcs from adaptations]] [[Category:The Rings of Power (TV series) characters]]
